subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] Re: Interim Font Code Standard
msgSnippet: ... No one has ever asked me to support Quikscript in Everson Mono. At this point I will wait until the Quikscript extensions are under ballot before adding
messageBody:
On 16 Apr 2013, at 13:13, "Zyggy2" <jayson@...> wrote:

> What standard do you use for QuikScript in Everson Mono?

No one has ever asked me to support Quikscript in Everson Mono. At this point I will wait until the Quikscript extensions are under ballot before adding any characters for this to Everson Mono. But since Everson Mono is not a cursive font, it will use the Shavian-style glyph forms for the extensions.

Michael Everson * http://www.evertype.com/
